channel.title: Comments on: Untitled Monserrat Project
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: She started the Single Mom Foundation, but, from the web site, it doesn't look like it is open for business yet. It focuses on helping single moms in Utah.
item.content:encoded: She started the Single Mom Foundation, but, from the web site, it doesn’t look like it is open for business yet. It focuses on helping single moms in Utah.

item.title: By: Rachel
item.dc:creator: Rachel
item.description: Awesome idea!!! I know Nicholas Cages wife (or ex-wife) has some sort of funding program for single moms. I haven't had a chance to look into it yet. Good luck^^
item.content:encoded: Awesome idea!!! I know Nicholas Cages wife (or ex-wife) has some sort of funding program for single moms. I haven’t had a chance to look into it yet. Good luck^^
